item.title: Planning your startup project
item.description: This article will be devoted to a major task that should be considered before designing the next $$$$-billion start-up. It’s all about planning technologies, processes, the future, monetization, databases everything. When you develop technology products, many things can go wrong and you should be ahead by following a strict plan. Below I cite the plan that I usually follow when building the ideas I have (unsuccessfully most of the times but I believe this is a good plan though!
